info.title: LearningSuite API
info.description: Public API for LearningSuite. Use the path **/api/v1** as prefix for all your requests.

get.summary: dummy endpoint to check authorization

disableLoginEmail.description: If true, the user will not receive a welcome email with login instructions

doNotRequirePasswordChange.description: If true, the user will not be required to change their password on first login

locale.description: The language setting of the member in the plattform

ignoreIfAlreadyExists.description: If the member already exists, no error will be thrown and the existing member will be returned

get.summary: Get members

schema.description: Include groups the member is part of in the response for each member

parameters.name: days_not_logged_in_gte
parameters.description: The minimum number of days the user has not logged in. If set, per default users who have never logged in are not included.

parameters.name: include_never_logged_in
parameters.description: Include users who never logged in in the result. If days_not_logged_in_gte is not set, default is true, otherwise false.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of members to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of members to skip -> useful for pagination

items.description: Depending if includeGroups is false or true, the response will be User or UserWithGroups

get.summary: Get a member by email

schema.description: Include groups the member is part of in the response for each member
Depending if includeGroups is false or true, the response will be User or UserWithGroups

get.summary: Get a member

schema.description: Include groups the member is part of in the response
Depending if includeGroups is false or true, the response will be User or UserWithGroups

email.description: Needs to be a valid email and unique for the tenant.

locale.description: The language setting of the member in the plattform

get.summary: Get all courses for a member with access and progress information

parameters.name: dateForAccessCheck
parameters.description: defaults to current date

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of courses to return -> for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of courses to skip -> for pagination

disableAccessNotificationEmail.description: If true, the user will not receive an email new course accesses

sendLoginLinkInCourseEmail.description: If true, the user will receive a login link in the course access email if he has never logged in before. The email even be sent within the first 24 hours after user creation (Normally we do not send any emails to new users in the first 24 hours, if they have not logged in).

get.summary: Get a member's access  and progress information for a course

parameters.name: dateForAccessCheck
parameters.description: defaults to current date

200.description: Information about the member's access and progress with the course

get.summary: Get all bundles of a member with access information

allOf.description: If set, overrides the date the user will have got access. Useful when wanting to override certain content drips or access durations.
If set, the user has only access until this date. The access duration from the bundle will be ignored.

unlimitedAccess.description: If set, the user has unlimited access to the bundle, independent of the access duration of the bundle

disableAccessNotificationEmail.description: If true, the user will not receive an email new course accesses

bundleIds.description: List of bundle ids to remove the member from.

get.summary: Get Team Members, which includes all users which are NOT members and therefore have admin zone access

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of users to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of users to skip -> useful for pagination

get.summary: Get a specific Team Member by email. If multiple users with the same email exist, the first one found will be returned.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email is case insensitive, but needs to be an exact match

get.summary: Get a Team Member by ID
Get all roles

post.summary: Send push notifications to all requested users with an active login session. Note: This is only available if a custom app is used.

schema.description: Either userIds or groupIds must be provided.

userIds.description: List of user IDs to send the push notification to

groupIds.description: List of group IDs to send the push notification to all members of the group

title.description: The title of the push notification

body.description: The body text of the push notification in Plain Text.

publicImageUrl.description: A public image URL to show in the push notification.

successCount.description: Number of successfully sent push notifications

get.summary: Get bundles
Get members of a bundle with access info

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of members to return -> for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of members to skip -> for pagination

get.summary: Get published courses
Get all modules of a course
Get all modules of a course, with the visibility information for the given member.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: The member to get the content drip information for

memberData.description: Content drip and visibility information for the member. Null if the module is not present in the published course version.

visibility.description: If the module is currently: VISIBLE (accessible), HIDDEN (not shown) or LOCKED (shown but not accessible) for the member.

earliestVisitableDate.description: The earliest date the member had access to the module content, taking into account content drip settings and overrides. Null if the member has not yet started.

effectiveContentDripState.description: The current effective content drip type for the member, taking into account content drip overrides.

started.description: Whether the member has started the module (e.g. viewed any lesson or started any quiz in the module).

contentDripIsOverridden.description: Whether the content drip settings for this module have been overridden for the member.

isOverridden.description: Whether the content drip settings for this module have been overridden for the member. Same as memberData.contentDripIsOverridden.

get.summary: Get the members for a course, with access information and optional progress

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of members to return -> for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for limit -> for pagination

parameters.name: includeProgress
parameters.description: If set, a field called progressInfo will be included for each member.

get.summary: Get access requests for a module

schema.description: The maximum number of access requests to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of access requests to skip -> for pagination

get.summary: Get all submissions in a course. (chronological order with newest first)

schema.description: The maximum number of submissions to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of submissions to skip -> for pagination

schema.description: Ordered by submission created at date, newest first.

post.description: Creates a lesson in the provided section. If the thumbnail is extracted from the video, the video processing is asynchronous and the thumbnail might not be available immediately.

name.description: name of the lesson and page

htmlContent.description: Will be parsed to LearningSuite content, no media elements except images are supported at the moment.

videoUrl.description: A downloadable video url. The lesson image gets set asynchronous from the video thumbnail, if no thumbnail is provided.

thumbnailUrl.description: A downloadable image url. The lesson and video thumbnail is set by this image.

timestampInSecondsToGenerateThumbnail.description: The video timestamp in seconds to generate the thumbnail from. If not provided, the thumbnail is generated from the beginning of the video. The video processing is asynchronous and the thumbnail might not be available immediately.

immediatelyPublishCourse.description: automatically publishes all changes including this lesson

relativePath.description: relative student path to the lesson

get.summary: Get lessons for a module
Get all sections of a module

new_module_access.description: The new module access type. Note: For 'on_demand' additional configuration via the 'on_demand_value' is possible.

on_demand_value.description: If new_module_access is 'on_demand', this object can be used to set the reasonIsMandatory and description.

reasonIsMandatory.description: If true, the user will be required to provide a reason when requesting access to the module.

description.description: The description that is shown to the user when requesting access to the module.

get.summary: Get groups

items.description: Depending if includeUsers is false or true, the response will be Group or GroupWithUsers

get.summary: Find groups by name

items.description: Depending if includeUsers is false or true, the response will be Group or GroupWithUsers

disableAccessNotificationEmail.description: If true, the user will not receive an email new course accesses

groups.description: All affected groups with their updated user lists

disableAccessNotificationEmail.description: If true, the user will not receive an email new course accesses

get.summary: Get all courses of a group

disableAccessNotificationEmail.description: If true, the user will not receive an email new course accesses
If true, the user will not receive an email new course accesses

get.summary: Get hub templates
Get published hubs
Get hub template variables
Get a paginated list of popups

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of popups to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of popups to skip -> useful for pagination

get.summary: Get a custom popup

parameters.name: popupId
parameters.description: Custom Popup ID or SID (short ID)

post.summary: Trigger a popup for a member

delete.summary: Remove a popup trigger for a member

get.summary: Get community areas

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of community areas to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of community areas to skip -> useful for pagination

get.summary: Get community forums

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of community forums to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of community forums to skip -> useful for pagination

get.summary: Get all published community posts

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of community posts to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of community posts to skip -> useful for pagination

get.summary: Get community badges

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of community badges to return -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of community badges to skip -> useful for pagination

parameters.name: badgeGroupId
parameters.description: If set, only badges of the given badge group id are returned

badgeIds.description: The badge ids to assign to the user

added.description: The amount of badges added to the user

badgeIds.description: The badge ids to remove from the user

removed.description: The amount of badges removed from the user

post.summary: Comment on a Community Post or answer to a comment of the post

authorUserId.description: The id of the user who is commenting. Needs to be an admin.

answerToCommentId.description: If set, the comment is an answer to another comment

commentText.description: The text of the comment. Needs to be plain text, with no formatting (e.g. no HTML)

enableWebhookTriggering.description: Per default, commenting via API does NOT trigger webhooks. Set this to true, if you want to trigger webhooks like the community.post.commented event. WARNING: This can lead to infinite loops, if the webhook calls the same API again.

/webhooks/subscription.description: Subscribe to events via webhooks. The webhook Response will be one of SubscriptionPayload.

get.summary: Get all subscriptions

hookUrl.description: The URL to call with the event data. The data type is defined in SubscriptionPayload.

get.summary: Get a subscription

hookUrl.description: The URL to call with the event data

id.description: The id of the deleted subscription

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set, the last progress changed event of this user is returned. (userId and courseId need to be provided)

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: If set, the last progress changed event of this user is returned. (userId and courseId need to be provided)

get.summary: Get sample data for progress changed events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set, the last lesson completed event of this user is returned. (userId, courseId, moduleId and lessonId all need to be provided)

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: If set, the last lesson completed event of this user is returned. (userId, courseId, moduleId and lessonId all need to be provided)

parameters.name: moduleId
parameters.description: If set, the last lesson completed event of this user is returned. (userId, courseId, moduleId and lessonId all need to be provided)

parameters.name: lessonId
parameters.description: If set, the last lesson completed event of this user is returned. (userId, courseId, moduleId and lessonId all need to be provided)

get.summary: Get sample data for the lesson completed event
Get sample data for feedback events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set, the last new login event of this user is returned

parameters.name: loginType
parameters.description: The type of login event

get.summary: Get sample data for new login events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set, 3 or less past exam completed events of this user are returned

get.summary: Get sample data for exam completed events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set, 3 or less past exam completed events of this user are returned

get.summary: Get sample data for exam graded events

parameters.name: customPopupId
parameters.description: If set and userId is set, 3 events for this user and the popupId are returned

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set and customPopupId is set, 3 events for this user and the popupId are returned

parameters.name: interactionType
parameters.description: The interaction to create the events for. If not provided, will be set random.

get.summary: Get sample data for custom popup triggered events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set 3 events for this user, with the optional area and forum filter, are returned

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: The id of the forum to filter for

parameters.name: forumId
parameters.description: The id of the area to filter for

get.summary: Get sample data for communityPost.created events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set 3 events for this user, with the optional area and forum filter, are returned

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: The id of the forum to filter for

parameters.name: forumId
parameters.description: The id of the area to filter for

get.summary: Get sample data for communityPost.moderated events

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set 3 events for this user, with the optional area and forum filter, are returned

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The id of the post to filter for

get.summary: Get sample data for communityPost.commented events

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The id of the group to filter for

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If set 3 events for this user, with the optional area and forum filter, are returned

get.summary: Get sample data for group.userAccessChanged events

parameters.name: courseInstanceId
parameters.description: The id of the course to filter for

get.summary: Get sample data for course.updated events

parameters.name: courseInstanceId
parameters.description: The id of the course to filter for. If not provided, a course with at least one member will be searched for.

get.summary: Get sample data for course.memberAdded events

locale.description: The language setting of the member in the plattform

accessPaths.description: The access paths of the user to the course. If bundleId and GroupId are set, the user got access through a group, which has a bundle, which has the course. If both are not set, the user has direct access

courseInstanceId.description: The course instance id of the course the user has access to

groupId.description: The id of the group which enables the access to the course for this user.

bundleId.description: The id of the bundle which enables the access to the course for this user.

allOf.description: Only available if 'includeProgress' is set as query parameter

progressForCurrentMemberAccessibleConten.description: The progress of the member, only regarding the content that is visible to the member.

progressShownToMember.description: The progress as shown to the member. Content that is hidden or marked as 'coming soon' is not included in this progress. Float from 0 to 1.

totalProgress.description: The progress of the member regarding all content of the course. Float from 0 to x (can be larger than 1 if user has access to a module via content drip override which is normally not accessible)

totalLearningTimeFormatted.description: formatted total learning time in hours and minutes

accessGivenAt.description: The earliest time the user got access to the bundle. Computed from the user's groups and direct access. Can be manually overridden.

accessUntil.description: The time the user's access to the bundle ends. Computed with the bundle access duration. Can be manually overridden. If null, the access does not end automatically.

unlimitedAccess.description: If true, the user has unlimited access to the bundle

locked.description: If true, the direct access was locked due to a failing payment from copecart. The user can still have access through groups

pauses.description: The pauses of the user's access to the bundle, each pause duration gets added to the access duration, if not unlimited

pausedUntil.description: If null, the pause is set indefinitely until manually removed

directAccess.description: If true, the user has direct access to the bundle. Otherwise, the user has access through one or more groups

accessThroughGroups.description: The groups the user has access through

slug.description: The slug of the course, used for the URL

id.description: The Id of the published course

sid.description: The short id for small urls

indented.description: If true, the module is displayed indented in the course outline.

sectionsDoneOneByOne.description: [Only for learning modules] If true, the sections of the module have to be done one by one. If false, the sections can be done in any order.

items.description: The User IDs of the authors of the module

ExternalOrigin.description: Meta data if the entity was imported from an external platform

createdAt.description: The date when the submission was created

studentComment.description: this field exists for all submission types except submit_text_input

value.description: this field only exists for submit_text_input

draft.description: This flag indicates that the lesson is not available to members.

visibility.description: The visibility status of the lesson. Draft will hide the lesson from all members, Visible will show the lesson to all members with access, Coming Soon will show the lesson but it is locked.

documentId.description: The collaborative document the hub is using.

currentlyPublishedDocumentVersionId.description: The document version that was last published from this hub.

creationVariables.description: The variables that were used to create the hub from a template

SubscriptionType.description: The type of event to subscribe to

courseInstanceId.description: The id of the published course
The id of the published course
The id of the published course

above.description: The minimum progress the member must have to trigger the event. From 0 to 100 [%]

courseInstanceId.description: The id of the published course

loginType.description: To subscribe to a specific login type

userRoleId.description: To subscribe to a specific user role

courseInstanceId.description: The id of the published course

examModuleId.description: The id of the Exam Module

courseInstanceId.description: The id of the published course

examModuleId.description: The id of the Exam Module

customPopupId.description: The id of the Custom Popup

courseInstanceId.description: The id of the published course

moduleId.description: The id of the Learning Module

areaId.description: The id of the area to filter for

forumId.description: The id of the forum to filter for

published.description: If true, only posts that are published are returned. If false, only posts that are not published are returned (e.g. posts in moderated forums which are not handled yet.). If not set, both published and unpublished posts are returned.

areaId.description: The id of the area to filter for

forumId.description: The id of the forum to filter for

approved.description: If true, only posts that are approved are returned. If false, only posts that are rejected are returned. If not set, both approved and rejected posts are returned.

areaId.description: The id of the area to filter for

forumId.description: The id of the forum to filter for

mentionedUserIds.description: If set, only comments that tag at least one of the given team-member ids are returned. NOTE: only available for users with admin-zone access, not for members.

items.description: The id of the mentioned user to filter for

groupId.description: The id of the group to filter for

action.description: The type of action to filter for: added or removed

courseInstanceId.description: The id of the course to filter for
The id of the course to filter for

resolvedAt.description: The date the feedback was resolved. Null if the feedback was not resolved yet.

respondedAt.description: The date the feedback was responded. Null if the feedback was not responded yet.

updatedByMemberAt.description: The date the feedback was updated by the member. Null if the feedback was not updated yet.

previousVersionHistory.description: The previous version history of the feedback

userAuthSessionId.description: The id of the user auth session

studentFeedback.description: The feedback the student provided after completing the exam. This is optional and may not be present in all cases.

examSessionId.description: The unique identifier for the exam session. This is used to track the specific instance of the exam taken by the user.

id.description: The id of the Exam Module. This may be null if the exam module is already deleted.

percentage.description: The percentage of the achieved points

shouldRetry.description: If the exam should be retried

approved.description: If true, the post was approved. If false, the post was rejected.

rejectionReason.description: The reason for the rejection. Only set if approved is false.

id.description: The id of the comment. Can be used to comment an answer to the comment.

answerToCommentId.description: If set, this comment is an answer to another comment with the given id.

publishedAt.description: The date the comment was published. Null if the comment is not published yet (e.g. in moderated forums).

action.description: The type of access change: added or removed

allOf.description: Can be null, if the publishing was done by an automated system process.

versionName.description: The name of this course version

versionNotes.description: Optional notes on the course version

name.description: The current name of the element

changeCountIncludingDescendants.description: The number of changes in the entity itself and all its descendants.

changes.description: The list of changes made to the element

oneOf.description: The type of change made. Either 'created' or 'deleted' dont indicate if the entire element was created or deleted, but that this element was added or removed from the course structure visible to the member.
Change object with before and after values, indicating what was changed.

field.description: The field name that was changed

before.description: The value of the element before the change

after.description: The value of the element after the change

internalName.description: The internal name of the custom popup, shown in the admin panel.

ContentDrip.description: Settings of how and when the content is shown to the user

oneOf.title: CUSTOM
oneOf.description: Custom settings to change the content drip

oneOf.title: ON_DEMAND

reasonIsMandatory.description: It is manditory for the member to state a reason

oneOf.description: The member has to request access

shadowBanned.description: When a post has been reported as abuse by 3 or more users, this is true, then the post is hidden in the feed (except for the author), until an admin has handled the abuse reports.

reason.description: The reason why the thread was closed

commentsDisabled.description: If true, comments are disabled for this post after closing the thread

publishedAt.description: The date the post was published. Null if the post is not published yet.

bodyText.description: The body of the post, converted to plain text

color.description: The color of the badge in hex format, e.g. #FF0000 for red

link.description: A link that is opened when the badge is clicked

communityBadgeGroupId.description: The id of the badge group this badge belongs to

shadowBanned.description: When a comment has been reported as abuse by 3 or more users, this is true, then the comment is hidden in the feed (except for the author), until an admin has handled the abuse reports.

publishedAt.description: The date the post was published. Null if the post is not published yet.

commentText.description: The body of the post, converted to plain text

answerToCommentId.description: The id of the comment this comment is an answer to. Null if this comment is not an answer.

IsoDateTime.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format with optional time zone offset. The default is UTC time (e.g., 2023-10-05T14:48:00Z)
